explains: v. 涂抹，涂上；诽谤，诋毁；弄脏，弄污；蹭花，变模糊
n. 污点，污渍；诽谤，诋毁；子宫颈抹片检查；（显微镜）涂片；（登山）不稳立足处
wordGroup: pap smear 子宫颈抹片检查
blood smear 血涂片；血液涂片

sentences.en: The cervical smear test is a lifesaver.
sentences.cn: 宫颈涂片检查是健康救星。

sentences.en: They planned to smear him by publishing information about his private life.
sentences.cn: 他们计划通过公开有关他私生活方面的信息来诋毁他。

sentences.en: He puts all the accusations down to a smear campaign by his political opponents.
sentences.cn: 他把所有的指控归因于由其政敌发起的诽谤活动。
